snippet.title: Lloyd the Monkey 2 - SAGE 2019 Trailer
snippet.description:
The Sonic Amatuer Games Expo is underway, and what better way to mark the occasion than with a new trailer for Lloyd the Monkey 2?!

We hope you guys enjoy the demo and are looking forward to the full release next summer!
Primary Download: https://sonicfangameshq.com/forums/showcase/lloyd-the-monkey-2-sage-2019-demo.335/
Alternate Downloads: https://meyer-games.itch.io/lloyd-the-monkey-2
https://gamejolt.com/games/lloydthemonkey2/417832


-Music: Jikai Yokoku (Next Episode Preview) by Shiro Sagisu-
